text: The Young Avengers are the titular main protagonists of the Marvel Comics of the same name. The first team, created by Allan Heinberg and Jim Cheung, appeared in Young Avengers #1 (April 2005), a year later in Spain. They are a team of young vigilantes and superheroes and the younger counterparts of the Avengers. Some of the members are the superheroes' children (such as Vision and Scarlet Witch's sons Wiccan and Speed and Ant-Man's daughter Cassie). Other members are their protégés (such as Hawkeye's student, Kate Bishop). Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Young Avengers
